name: part_006
file: tmp_【チラ見せ】hololive 3rd Generation Live#きゅるるん大作戦〜最強アイドル、推すしかないでしょ〜【DAY1】 [cgvMVU2sO_U]_gemini-3-pro-preview/reencoded/part_006.mov

scenes.description: Opening sequence with crowd cheering, light shows, and member introductions on screen.
Hololive 3rd Generation members performing the song 'Suki Suki Daisuki'.

subtitles.original: I I I I I love you
subtitles.english: I I I I I love you

subtitles.original: もう I I I I I need you
subtitles.english: Geez, I I I I I need you

subtitles.original: もっと もっと もっと もっと
subtitles.english: More, more, more, more

subtitles.original: 好きなだけ愛させて
subtitles.english: Let me love you as much as I like.

subtitles.original: 3期生ライブ、いくぺこ！
subtitles.english: 3rd Gen Live, here we go peko!

subtitles.original: みんなで最高の思い出、作ろうね！
subtitles.english: Let's make the best memories together!

subtitles.original: くるくる脳内君だらけ
subtitles.english: My brain is spinning, full of you.

subtitles.original: どうかしてるわね私
subtitles.english: I must be losing my mind.

subtitles.original: 心臓ドキドキ鳴ってる
subtitles.english: My heart is pounding.

subtitles.original: 警報
subtitles.english: Warning.

subtitles.original: 毎日幻覚現れて
subtitles.english: Hallucinations appear every day.

subtitles.original: 頭に花咲いちゃって
subtitles.english: Flowers are blooming in my head.

subtitles.original: こういった奴は非常識ですわ
subtitles.english: This kind of thing is against common sense.

subtitles.original: いっそ食べちゃいたい
subtitles.english: I'd rather just eat you up.

subtitles.original: フリーズした感情
subtitles.english: Frozen emotions.

subtitles.original: 誰もが持ってる願い
subtitles.english: A wish that everyone holds.

subtitles.original: 純純純盲詠唱
subtitles.english: Chanting for pure, pure, blind love.

subtitles.original: 堂々して急上昇
subtitles.english: Magnificently soaring.

subtitles.original: これが恋ならもう後悔しないわ
subtitles.english: If this is love, I won't regret it anymore.

subtitles.original: だから
subtitles.english: So,

subtitles.original: 君のこと大好き大好き大好き大好き大好き
subtitles.english: I love you, love you, love you, love you, love you.

subtitles.original: 溢れるこの
subtitles.english: This overflowing...

subtitles.original: 愛は
subtitles.english: Love is...

subtitles.original: ずってもっと止まらない
subtitles.english: Never stopping, it just grows.

subtitles.original: I I I I I love you
subtitles.english: I I I I I love you

subtitles.original: 君が I I I I I need you
subtitles.english: You... I I I I I need you

subtitles.original: もっと もっと もっと もっと
subtitles.english: More, more, more, more

subtitles.original: 好きなだけ愛してね
subtitles.english: Love me as much as you like.

subtitles.original: ゆるゆるハートがピョンピョンピョン
subtitles.english: My loose heart goes hop hop hop!

subtitles.original: 罠に落ちてアビャアビャ
subtitles.english: Falling into a trap, abya abya!

subtitles.original: こんなになってもいまだ抜け出せない
subtitles.english: I've become like this, but I still can't escape.

subtitles.original: どうしたもんかねヌイヌイヌイ
subtitles.english: What should I do, nui nui nui?

subtitles.original: 助けて君たちアホイホイ
subtitles.english: Save me, you guys, ahoy-hoy!

subtitles.original: もっと もっと
subtitles.english: More, more...

subtitles.original: 好きなだけ愛してね
subtitles.english: Love me as much as you like.

subtitles.original: ふわふわ浮かぶ夢の中
subtitles.english: Floating lightly inside a dream.

subtitles.original: 君の声で目が覚めた
subtitles.english: I woke up at the sound of your voice.

subtitles.original: 五感全部が君でおかしくなる
subtitles.english: All five senses go crazy because of you.

subtitles.original: 毎度お騒がせごめん
subtitles.english: Sorry for the disturbance every time.

subtitles.original: キュンで壊れちゃいそうだ
subtitles.english: I feel like I'm going to break from the love.

subtitles.original: こういった奴は制御不能ですわ
subtitles.english: This kind of thing is uncontrollable.

subtitles.original: いっそ抱きしめて
subtitles.english: Just hold me tight already.

subtitles.original: 壊してもいいよ
subtitles.english: You can break me if you want.

subtitles.original: 誰にも邪魔はさせない
subtitles.english: I won't let anyone get in the way.

subtitles.original: ピチピチ感情で
subtitles.english: With fresh and lively emotions,

subtitles.original: キラキラ急展開
subtitles.english: A sparkling sudden turn of events.

subtitles.original: これが運命ならもう迷わない
subtitles.english: If this is fate, I won't hesitate anymore.

subtitles.original: 覚悟してね
subtitles.english: Brace yourself, okay?

subtitles.original: 君だけが大好き大好き大好き大好き大好き
subtitles.english: I love only you, love you, love you, love you, love you.

subtitles.original: 私のこの
subtitles.english: This love of mine,

subtitles.original: 愛は
subtitles.english: Love is...

subtitles.original: ずっともう離さない
subtitles.english: Will never let you go.

subtitles.original: Be be be my baby and...
subtitles.english: Be be be my baby and...

subtitles.original: Kiss kiss kiss kiss kiss to me
subtitles.english: Kiss kiss kiss kiss kiss to me

subtitles.original: もっと もっと もっと もっと
subtitles.english: More, more, more, more

subtitles.original: 私だけを見ててね
subtitles.english: Look only at me, okay?
